mapper.insert:
insert into expedia_rooms_amenities (hotel_id, room_id, amenities_id, amenities_name_en, amenities_name, amenities_value, amenities_categories) values
(#{item.hotelId},#{item.roomId},#{item.amenitiesId},#{item.amenitiesNameEn},#{item.amenitiesName}, #{item.amenitiesValue},#{item.amenitiesCategories})
